Installation¶

From pypi:

$ pip install django-sidebar

or:

$ easy_install django-sidebar

or clone from github:

$ git clone git://github.com/ekaputra07/django-sidebar.git

or:

$ cd django-sidebar
$ sudo python setup.py install
